# Set Curs
<!--
@name: Set Curs
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/amos_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AMOS Pro" title="AMOS Pro" /><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/stos_logo.png" valign="center" alt="STOS Basic" title="STOS Basic" /></div>

Define the shape of the text cursor
## Parameters

- **l1**: Byte mask representing the first line
- **l2**: Byte mask representing the second line
- **l3**: Byte mask representing the third line
- **l4**: Byte mask representing the fourth line
- **l5**: Byte mask representing the fifth line
- **l6**: Byte mask representing the sixth line
- **l7**: Byte mask representing the seventh line
- **l8**: Byte mask representing the nineth line
---
